p: Welcome to the Live Hack API Documentation
Live Hack offers a public API that allows the recovery of public data from the platform, but also an API that allows you to manage private data via authentication.
All the private Live Hack API
Go to: profile > settings click on "copy my api key" All the private api url starts with /api/p1/
This route allow you to change your phone number on the Amelia hub URL: /pub/p1/signal/newPhone Body: POST
Note that you will recice a code via message for phone validation
This route allow you to check your phone number set before URL: /pub/p1/signal/certifPhone Body: POST
You can now send message to your phone number via Signal ! URL: /pub/p1/signal/send Body: POST
All the public api wihout oauth
This request allows to retrieve the public data of a user with his nickname.
If the response only contains the username, the user does not exist !
